summary:
*Gazes up at moonlight with wide eyes* 🌙😍 *Twitches nose, sensing whispers in darkness* 👣👂
*Sighs softly, lost in shadows' mystery* Rrr-zzmmmph! 🔍
*Nods slightly, ears perked up: Hrr-hrrr...*
dream:
*Darts between moonbeams, paws barely touching ground* 🌙💫
*Twitches nose, sensing secrets in the night air* 👂👀
*Lifts head, letting out a soft howl: Hrr-hrr-ooo!* 🌃😆
goal:
Wuuu-ooo? 🐾💔 *whimpers softly, tail tucked between legs*
Hrrr-hrr... Waaa-zzmmmph! 🔍🌙 *sniffs the air, ears perked up*
Rrr-mmm-pffft! 🌃😨 *shivers at the darkness, eyes glowing in the dark*
